def.dt: :a black or brownish-black hard substance within the earth that is used as a fuel a bin of coal The furnace burns coal. a lump of coal often used before another noun a coal bin/mine/bed/stove the coal industry
:a piece of coal or charcoal especially when burning When the coals are red, they are very hot.
:a glowing piece of wood from a fire :ember I toasted one last marshmallow over the coals of the campfire.
:to take something to a place where it is not needed because a large amount of it is already there
:to criticize (someone) very severely I arrived late for the meeting and was immediately hauled over the coals by my boss.
:a black, sticky liquid made from coal that is used as a fuel and to make various products (such as soap)
:a kind of grain used for food and to make beer and whiskey
:the plant on which this grain grows
:a plant with dark seeds that are used to make grain and flour
:grain or flour made from the seeds of the buckwheat plant
